locationPermissionDescription: We require access to your location, including background location, to make sure you're visible to other users within 350 meters at all times. This allows users to interact with you by sending winks, and you can wink back. We collect your location data solely to make this feature work, and it will only be shared with nearby users for interaction purposes. Your location data will not be shared for any other purpose. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
onboarding_page_1: Young people feel more alone than ever.
onboarding_page_1_subtitle: Despite being surrounded by people every day, making real connections has become harder for our generation. There's more youths with trauma and negative experiences than ever.
onboarding_page_1_point_1: ‚öà Social anxiety and mental health challenges make it difficult to connect naturally
onboarding_page_1_point_2: ‚öà Digital platforms often leave us feeling more isolated, not less
onboarding_page_2: Meet People in Real Life, Not on Your Screen
onboarding_page_2_subtitle: GenZ helps you connect with others by showing only those nearby as you go about your day.
onboarding_page_2_point_1: ‚öà See people within a 100-200 meter radius, only when you‚Äôre outside.
onboarding_page_2_point_2: ‚öà Encourages real-world interactions, not endless scrolling.
onboarding_page_3: Built for Introverts to Limit Social Anxiety
onboarding_page_3_subtitle:
GenZ is designed to reduce social anxiety and help you connect in a comfortable way. It's built for introverts and neurodivergent users who wish to expand their relationships.
Simplified interaction model to avoid overwhelming social cues.
onboarding_page_3_point_1: ‚öà Simplified interaction model to avoid overwhelming social cues.
onboarding_page_3_point_2: ‚öà Prioritizes quality connections over quantity. Don't feel judged.
onboarding_page_4_subtitle: There's no endless scrolling, and there's built in features to help you manage your digital well-being.
onboarding_page_4_point_1: ‚öà Auto-disable visibility during late hours (11 PM - 6 AM).
onboarding_page_4_point_2: ‚öà Encourages real-world presence, not screen time.
onboarding_page_5_subtitle: You‚Äôre in control of who sees you and when with privacy-focused features, directly from the first screen.
onboarding_page_5_point_1: ‚öà Easily enable ‚ÄúGhost Mode‚Äù on the home screen to go invisible.
onboarding_page_5_point_2: ‚öà Location only visible within a limited radius, never beyond.
onboarding_page_6_subtitle: Connect without any pressure. GenZ is here to support positive mental health and social wellness.
onboarding_page_6_point_1: ‚öà Designed for those facing loneliness, social anxiety, or trauma.
onboarding_page_6_point_2: ‚öà Encourages meaningful connections, not appearance-based judgments.
